title: Decision Making
description: This focuses on the process of making effective decisions within a group setting. Participants will explore various decision-making models and strategies to enhance their ability to make informed and collaborative choices.

title: Communication
description: This explores the fundamental aspects of communication within a group context. Participants will learn effective communication skills, active listening, and strategies for fostering open and transparent communication in group settings.

title: Leadership
description: This focuses on developing leadership skills within a group. Participants will explore different leadership styles, communication strategies, and methods for motivating and guiding a team towards common goals.

title: Conflict Management
description: This addresses the identification and resolution of conflicts within group settings. Participants will learn conflict resolution strategies, negotiation skills, and how to turn conflicts into opportunities for growth.

title: Norms
description: This explores the establishment and maintenance of norms within a group. Participants will learn about the importance of shared expectations, rules, and norms in shaping group behavior.

title: Roles
description: This focuses on the definition and distribution of roles within a group. Participants will explore the importance of assigning and fulfilling roles to ensure effective collaboration and task completion.

title: Size
description: This examines the impact of group size on dynamics and functioning. Participants will explore the advantages and challenges associated with different group sizes and strategies for optimizing group performance.
